name: Coomera VR - Auditorium
description:
The eerie sensation being inside the Coomera Campus Auditorium, this game displays an environment that is placed inside the Auditorium and the currently known as an exploration type, but in future this game will become an OHS and demonstration game to clients that are planning to use the Auditorium. At this moment, there are basic functions around the game and you can muck around as much as you wish if unless you are planning to break it.

Project Team:

Roy Jonasson - Designer and Artist

Michael Sutton - Content Supplier (Client)

Ann Stevens - Producer

Justin Carter - Studio Director
